job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Tensor Flow , PyTorch)
job.description: Skills Required:Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Machine Learning , Artificial Intelligence or a related technical field or equivalent practical experienceHands-on experience in implementing machine learning techniques using Python, R etc.Â Experience with Tensor Flow , PyTorch .Expertise in analytical concepts such as - Regression, Clustering, Classification, Tree based models, and/or other machine learning techniquesÂ An understanding of Deep Learning techniques (CNNs, RNNs, GANs, Reinforcement Learning)Â A high-level understanding of automation on a cloud environment Google Cloud (GCP) and/or AWS experience Previous experience building Banking /Insurance/Investments ML models (strongly desired)Great analytical and quantitative skillsAbility to think creatively and work well both as an individual contributor and as part of teams across multiple locationsStrong communication skills and the ability to simplify the complexity of various algorithmsÂ Demonstrated exceptional abilities in some areas of their life and will raise the effectiveness of your team. In short, we are looking for a âDifference MakerâRoles and Responsibilities:Be/Become a Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence expert and apply cutting edge research technologies to solve real world business problemsWork with various client stakeholders understand and evaluate their business pain points and identify areas where data science and analytics can be the solutionÂ Develop high-level solution architectures and design ML/AI applicationsÂ Work with data science and ML engineering teams to build, test, and assess models to predict and optimize business outcomesÂ Work closely with delivery manager and team members, across multiple locations, to ensure seamless delivery and communication cadencesÂ Communicate complex concepts and insights in a clear and concise mannerMaintain an entrepreneurial spirit as you learn new ways to solve problems
